resources.string:
Echo Dot
Meet Echo Dot with clock - Our most popular smart speaker with Alexa. The sleek, compact design delivers crisp vocals and balanced bass for full sound.

Echo Show 15
Alexa can show you even more – With a 15.6" Full HD (1080p) smart display and 5 MP camera, family organization and entertainment will look brilliant. You can choose portrait or landscape orientation.

Halo View
More than just counting steps — Access key Halo health metrics like heart rate, Activity points, Sleep score, and on-demand blood oxygen levels on the Halo View color touch display.

Echo Frames
Meet Echo Frames - All-day glasses with hands-free access to Alexa.
